definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: male, man ([[מְתוּ־]] in n.pr.; Zinj. [[מת]] coll. males, male offspring; As. mutu, husband; Eth. mt: id.; cf. Eg.m-t, phallus, male, Steindorff in Ba:NB § 2b, d);—only pl. [[מְתִים]] Job 11:3 + 3 t., [[מְתִם]] De 2:34, De 3:6 + Ju Jdg 20:48 (probably), for MT [[מְתׂם]], so GFM ; cstr. [[מְתֵי]] Ge 34:30 + 13 t.; sf. 2 fs. [[מְתַיִח]]; Is 3:25; 3 ms. [[מְתָיו]] De 33:6; —

males, men, Is 3:25 (‖[[גְּבוּרָתֵךְ]]); more distinctly, [[וְהַטָּף]] [[הַנׇּשִׁים]]([[וְ]]) [[מְתִם]] [[עִיר]] De 2:34, De 3:6 every city of males (male population, cf. Dr), and the women, etc.; Ju Jdg 20:48 (v. supr.; opp. [[בְּהֵמָה]]).
usu. less emphasis on sex, in prose only phr.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[מְתֵי מִסְפָּר]] men of number (numerable, i.e. few) Ge 34:30 (J; appos. of [[אֲנִי]] = Jacob, representing his family), De 4:27, Je 44:28, also Ps 105:12 = 1Ch 16:19; cf. [[וִיהִי מְתָיו מִסְפָּר]] De 33:6 and (but) let his men be few.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[בִּמְתֵי מְעָָט]] = consisting of a few men De 26:5, De 28:62
elsewhere only poet., sex usu. not emph.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Job 11:3, Job 24:12, Ps 17:14, Ps 17:14 (but text prob. corrupt, of. Bae We; at least om. [[ממתים ידך]] Ol Bi Che, cf. Hup-Now); [[מְתֵי ישׂראל]] Is 41:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: poet. phr.: [[מְתֵי שָׁוְא]] men of false-hood Job 11:11, Ps 26:4; [[אָוֶן]] ´[[מ]] Ps 22:15 men of wickedness; [[סוֹדִי]] ´[[מ]] Job 19:19 men of my circle; [[אָהֳלִי]] ´[[מ]] Job 31:31 men of my tent (household); [[רָעָב]] ´[[מ]] Is 5:13 men of hunger, but read probably ´[[מְזֵי ר]] sucked out, empty from hunger (as De 32:24) Ew De Che Di Du (cf. [[מָזֶה]]).
